attributes.action: Keep India in Red List due to High number of Covid cases in country
attributes.additional_details: India is one of the worst affected by Covid-19. There are more than 32M confirmed cases and 430K confirmed deaths. The Indian Variant of Covid is dangerous and deadly around the world. There will be many people affected with various will come to UK and the life of people in UK will be in danger.
attributes.background: For the protection of people in UK, India should remain on the Red List until the Covid situation get better in that country.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the a similar action: 

India to be added to red list for travel
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/582026
